channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very big pothole with smaller ones appearing, 16th January
item.description:
Pothole of unacceptable size, can cause damage to cars or and pedestrians crossing road. It has been there since last year but getting bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lewis Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bulky furniture mattresses chairs rubbish, 16th January
item.description:
Brockwell park estate , langbourne house Outside bin doors / often blocking bin doors and not allowing access to bins / am not strong enough to move it Large amounts on regular basis for years now- request dummy camera and or lights Rats taking over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brixton, Greater London

item.title: Tree has large branch half broken off which needs pruning, 16th January
item.description:
Tree has large branch which has broken off several months ago which needs to be cut off cleanly to preserve the tree. If left this way with a partially snapped branch the tree will become diseased.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kenilworth Gardens, Plumstead

item.title: Towpath entrance opposite St Mark’s Church on Prince Albert Road, 16th January
item.description:
Submitting a new report for ref 8660647. I contacted the Canal & River Trust about this issue, but they confirmed it isn’t their responsibility. They also shared the attached map showing the boundaries. The area to the left of the green line, where the issue is located, falls outside their responsibility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince Albert Road Ramp, Chalk Farm, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole by the drain cover just before the bus stop opposite the petrol station, 16th January
item.description:
It's very bad and impossible to see when dark. Its just before the bus stop oppose the tesco petrol station. It needs to be filled in. It's been here a long time and have seen several cars experience problems. Its unacceptable to have this in such a busy area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deal Porters Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London

item.title: Dumped heavy suitcase - unknown items inside, 16th January
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping in Gillett Place from Stamford works, 16th January
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped all these black waste bags out of the back door for from Stamford works into the Gillett Place courtyard. They have been there since before Christmas. Wass likely jones and sons just before they moved out

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gillett Place, Hackney, London
